description: WakaTime offers automatic time tracking for developers, integrating with code editors and delivering dashboards on coding activity, project progress, and productivity

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_EDITORS
capabilities.description: Tool to list WakaTime IDE plugins with metadata. Use when you want to discover available IDE integrations and their latest versions.

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_GOALS
capabilities.description: Tool to list a user's goals with progress series and metadata. Use after authenticating the user with read_goals scope.

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_GOALS_CURRENT
capabilities.description: Tool to list the current user's goals with progress series and metadata. Use when you need to fetch active goals (requires read_goals scope).

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_INSIGHTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve an insight for a user over a time range. Use when analyzing user coding metrics after authentication.

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_INSIGHTS_CURRENT
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch a coding insight for the current user over a time range. Use when you need summaries like 'projects' or 'best_day' for a specific period. Requires OAuth scope `read_summaries`.

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_LEADERS
capabilities.description: Tool to list public leaders ranked by coding activity. Use when viewing top coders globally or filtering by language, country code, or hireable status.

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_MACHINE_NAMES
capabilities.description: Tool to list a user's machines including last seen time. Use when needing machine names for a specific user.

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_OAUTH_AUTHORIZE
capabilities.description: Tool to generate OAuth 2.0 authorization URL. Use when redirecting users to WakaTime to grant access.

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_PROJECTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all projects associated with the authenticated user. Use when you need project slugs and metadata. Useful for fetching projects after obtaining a valid OAuth token.

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_USERS_ALL_TIME_SINCE_TODAY
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve total coding time since account creation for a user. Use after authenticating to fetch all-time stats.

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_USERS_CURRENT_ALL_TIME_SINCE_TODAY
capabilities.description: Tool to get current user's total time logged since account creation. Use when you need lifetime aggregate stats for the authenticated user (requires read_stats scope).

capabilities.name: WAKATIME_GET_USERS_CURRENT_INSIGHTS
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch a coding insight for the current user over a time range. Use when needing project, language, or best_day metrics for a specific period. Requires OAuth scope `read_summaries`.
